Real Time Fun

SNAP

Take or upload a photo to Instagram.

TAG

Add the event hashtag.

STREAM

Stream the images on an event screen, instantly.

ENGAGE IN REAL TIME SHARING

Put your event attendees in the spotlight and encourage them to upload content to their social media channels, in the moment.

Beautiful Displays, Everywhere

Showcase your content in engaging, animated displays across one or multiple screens via our flexible display options.

Protect Your Brand Reputation

Need to exercise a little control? We enable content moderation on the fly to ensure only the best content is featured on your display.

Post Event Engagement

Continue the conversation post-event or engage fans at home by embedding the stream within your website or Facebook app.
